document_data.name: Gemen Bahrdlogh
document_data.mainbody: '''Gemen Bahrdlogh''' was a [[duergar]] blade-smith of renown in [[Gracklstugh]] in [[1484 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Gemen managed one of the best weapon-shops in Gracklstugh. He was a premier craftsman thanks to his ability to create [[magic weapon]]s.
document_data.History: In 1484 DR, just after the start of the [[War of the Silver Marches]], the [[derro]] assistants of Gemen went crazy because of the effects of the [[Demon Weave]]. However, an adventuring party sent by [[Axelcrantz]] helped Gemen to resolve the situation.
